languages.text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] When the wielder uses Controlled Shot the enemies adjacent to the wielder`s allies gain a -30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} against his next attack.

When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

languages.text: 当装备者使用控制射击时，装备者所有盟友周围的所有敌人下次被装备者攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}躲闪{/g}承受−30%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用控制射击时，装备者所有盟友周围的所有敌人下次被装备者攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}躲闪{/g}承受-30%{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。

languages.text: 制御された射撃を使用した場合、着用者の味方に隣接する敵は、着用者の次の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するのに30％の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: 制御された射撃を使用した場合、着用者の味方に隣接する敵は、着用者の次の攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}するのに30％の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Cuando el portador usa Disparo controlado, cualquier enemigo adyacente a los aliados del portador sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra el siguiente ataque del portador.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador usa Disparo controlado, cualquier enemigo adyacente a los aliados del portador sufre una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} del -30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} contra el siguiente ataque del portador.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger Kontrollierter Schuss nutzt, erleiden alle an seine Verbündeten angrenzenden Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen den nächsten Angriff des Trägers.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger Kontrollierter Schuss nutzt, erleiden alle an seine Verbündeten angrenzenden Feinde einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} gegen den nächsten Angriff des Trägers.

languages.text: Когда персонаж применяет Предостережение, противники на соседних клетках с союзниками получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от следующей атаки персонажа.
languages.original_text: When the wearer uses Controlled Shot, any enemies adjacent to the wearer's allies suffer a −30% {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the wearer's next attack.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж применяет Предостережение, противники на соседних клетках с союзниками получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от следующей атаки персонажа.

Когда персонаж применяет Предостережение, противники на соседних клетках с союзниками получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} от следующей атаки персонажа.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur a recours à Tir Contrôlé, tous les ennemis adjacents aux alliés de l'utilisateur subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} de −30 % contre l'attaque suivante de l'utilisateur.
